name: LetMeParkUS
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: let me park
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Say “Enough” to wasting your time and money on looking for parking. Say “Alexa, open LetMePark” and enjoy simple and stress free parking. 
The LetMePark skill gives drivers the ability to find the best parking while keeping your hands on the wheel and eyes on the road. All you have to do is say, “Alexa, open let me park,” say your destination, and LetMePark will find the closest parking spot to your destination. 
Parking reservation options will be available in the following months.

Description

LetMePark is an innovative company operating in the area of connected cars offering advanced and personalized parking and charging services. You can find your parking among over 2,500 parking options in 50 cities within the US. 

Tips:
- Enable geolocation permissions. In the Alexa app, under Skills & Games, My Skills, select LetMePark and under Skill Settings allow location services
- For assistance, text Parker at +34 658-206-038.
- For more information, visit www.letmepark.app
